purpose: The email announces the availability of six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor positions in the Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon. It invites applications from candidates with expertise in various areas of computer science, including Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering. The selection process emphasizes research ability and how candidates' expertise aligns with the department's strengths. The email outlines the application process, which consists of two stages, and specifies the deadline for first-stage applications as May 29, 2025.

evidence_sentences: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon invites applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor faculty positions in Computer Science.
We are primarily interested in recruiting excellent candidates in the areas of the department’s research groups on Computer Systems, Intelligent Systems, Multimodal Systems, and Software Systems.
Exceptional candidates in other areas of Computer Science will also be considered.
The selection process focuses on a candidate's proven research ability and dedication, and how their expertise complements the Department’s established strengths.
Tenure-track candidates should demonstrate exceptional research potential and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
We will conduct a two-stage application process.
For full consideration, first-stage applications must be received by May 29, 2025.
